H0.text: What is the Southern India savoury steamed cake made of rice and served with chutney. Dosa

H1.text: What is the Southern India savoury steamed cake made of rice and served with chutney. Vada

H2.text: What is the Southern India savoury steamed cake made of rice and served with chutney. Pongal

H3.text: What is the Southern India savoury steamed cake made of rice and served with chutney. Idli

A4.text: Idli (; plural: idlis) is a South Indian and Sri Lankan rice cake popular as a breakfast food.

A5.text: The cakes are made by steaming a batter consisting of fermented hulled black lentils and rice.
